name: Shipwreck (itch) (Sir_Capybara)
description:
A Pirate Game

SpaceBar - Change_Weapon

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Move

Escape - Return To Menu

Thank you Kenney for the free assets, it was very helpful :)

BUG WARNING:

If you die and click return to the menu, if you want to play again it will kill you instantly, to fix this reload the page, or once you die again click play again and it will fix it.
